dialogue.villagium.gentle.weather.respon: The weather is quite pleasant today, isn't it?
I do hope this nice weather lasts!
dialogue.villagium.gentle.joke.response1: Oh, that's a good one! Hehe.
dialogue.villagium.gentle.joke.response2: You have a fine sense of humor!
dialogue.villagium.gentle.local_news.res: I haven't heard much, but the village seems peaceful.
Did you hear about old Man Willow's cat? Quite the adventurer!
dialogue.villagium.gentle.hobbies.respon: I enjoy a bit of quiet reading when I can.
Tending to my small garden brings me joy.
dialogue.villagium.gentle.ask_how_feelin: I'm doing quite well, thank you for asking!
Feeling rather content today, the sun is lovely.
dialogue.villagium.gentle.fallback.respo: Hmm, I'm not sure what to say to that.
